channel.title: grammar on The Rules
channel.description: Recent content in grammar on The Rules

item.title: #17 - Grammatically Correct
item.description: Sometimes when I am browsing the internet I get upset quite easily. In the comment sections, people express themselves incorrectly with spelling and grammar errors. It was a bigger deal back in my old country, Russia. However, the English domain suffers from that too. You would argue, who am I, a non-native speaker, to critic and bash on how English people express their feelings in writing. Honestly, it doesn’t matter what language you speak.
